column4: Hello, using 8.04 lts on a core duo 2.4ghz 7600GS Nvidia, i've tried with the restricted drivers and now installed the latest drivers, dual monitors twinview enable video is choppy i've searched and tried a lot of methods but nothing seems to work (Players used: vlc, mplayer).
did you try the ones in add\remove
there are some nvidia drivers in add\remove applications
tried the restricted as well as the latest drivers
please let me know if you can come with anything
yes thankyou will check it out
that link just suggests installing the other drivers
did you find the programs in add \remove applications
Are you using the Nvidia control panel application
